ISSUE.TITLE: New Website using the API - https://www.spacexandmars.com/
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Hello! I created [SpaceX and Mars](https://www.spacexandmars.com/) making use of this API as a project for learning web development. The website displays SpaceX missions and weather on Mars. Would you add the website to the known app page, I would be appreciate it! The source code is on https://github.com/jiachengzhang1/spacex-and-mars/ Thank you
